org.hibernate.spatial.predicate

Class JTSSpatialPredicates

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.spatial.predicate.JTSSpatialPredicates
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpatialPredicates

    public class JTSSpatialPredicates
extends Object
    A factory for spatial JPA Criteria API Predicates.
    See Also:
    SpatialRestrictions
